author: wtopstaff
title: Bruins-Coyotes Sum
text:
2—3 
First Period_1, Arizona, Doan 1, 2:12. 
Second Period_2, Boston, Randell 2 (Krejci, Krug), 8:42. 3, Boston, Krejci 4 (Krug, Eriksson), 15:19 (pp). 
Third Period_4, Boston, Marchand 1 (Cross, Bergeron), 4:44 (sh). 5, Arizona, Rieder 3 (Doan, Stone), 4:57 (pp). 6, Arizona, Chipchura 1 (Doan, Ekman-Larsson), 7:21. 7, Boston, Bergeron 2 (Spooner, Krejci), 9:10 (pp). 8, Boston, Bergeron 3 (Chara, K.Miller), 18:54 (pp). 
Shots on Goal_Boston 14-19-10_43. Arizona 6-4-13_23. 
Goalies_Boston, Rask. Arizona, M.Smith. A_13,411 (17,125). T_2:35. Topics:
